title: [Bug voice over] Azir interraction when placing a ward is global for his allies
body:
When Azir place a ward, is voice over can be heard by all his teamates.
Edit: seems like all champ with voiceover interaction with placing ward have the problem

Repo step:
1-Start a game with a player playing Azir
2- The player with Azir buy ward
3- Place a ward as Azir
4- The player playing another champion will heard a line from Azir voiceover.

Reproduction : 100% with all the line from the interration with ward

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it! The global ward placement appears to be affecting multiple champions. D:
I experienced this as well in a game last night. The Azir also claimed to hear random Sion quotes (our top laner) despite being on the opposite side of the map. Not sure if the 2 are related.
